d: Hugo is a hooded jumper with raglan sleeves.

s.cutPocket.d: The **Pocket** (4) is not shown, but you can trace it from the Front part (1), which has the pocket outline on it (not including seam allowance). It is not shown because the **expand** core setting is currently disabled. Enable it to show this pattern part.
s.cutCuff.d: The **Cuff** (9) is a rectangular piece of ribbing fabric {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long (this includes seam allowance). It is not shown because the **expand** core setting is currently disabled. Enable it to show this pattern part.
s.cutWaistband.d: The **Waistband** (8) is a rectangular piece of ribbing fabric {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long (this includes seam allowance). It is not shown because the **expand** core setting is currently disabled. Enable it to show this pattern part.

ribbingHeight.d: Controls the height of the ribbing

ribbingStretch.d: Use this to adapt the pattern to how stretchy the ribbing that you are using is.

pocketWidth.d: Determined the width of the pocket.

hipsEase.d: The amount of ease at your hips.
